name: 劳拉·德莱弗斯
name_full: 劳拉·德莱弗斯 Laura Dreyfuss

last_movies.title: 了不起的麦瑟尔夫人 第二季

introduction: AboutBroadway actress and cast member in the final season of Glee who portrayed Madison McCarthy on the FOX series. She has Broadway credits in Hair, Once, and Dear Evan Hansen. In 2019, she began playing the character McAfee Westbrook on the Netflix series The Politician.Before FameHer career as a professional actress and singer began in 2010.TriviaShe was cast in a major supporting role in the 2017 film After Party. She traveled to Colombia to volunteer as a teacher for a couple of weeks.Family LifeHer mother has delivered her own grandchildren. She is an aunt.Associated WithShe and Billy Lewis Jr. played twins on the final season of Glee.
